buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification] is applied even when Dark Elf is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for undead units.
buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Undead and Elf)

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases game speed by 5% and increases its attack speed and movement speed by 7%.
Increases attack range, movement speed and critical damage of all units by 5%.
[Tribe Fortification] is applied even when Dark Elf is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for undead units.
description.skill2: Increase HP of Undead units in Outland Battle. (0%, 0%, 12%, 16%, 21%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Dark Elf ]
